data.title: Christine Hermosa Biography: First Husband, Net Worth, Age, Children, Movies, TV Shows, Adopted Son, Father, Video Blog
data.meta_description: gpt3]Summarize this content to 100 words: pass Kristine Hermosa Orille-Sotto (born September 9, 1983) is one of the famous Filipino actresses and television personalities. She is known by her stage name Kristine Hermosa. She was born in Masbate, Philippines. She has performed very well in every movie she has appeared in, gaining recognition both at home and abroad. Her soap operas from 2000 to 2010 were hits, including Pangako Sa Yo, Sana'y Wala Nang Wales and Dahil May Isang Ikaw. Kristen became very famous after starring in the TV series The Promises. She is regarded as a very beautiful and talented actress whose area of ​​focus is derived from her Spanish mother, Maria Alma Hermosa-Orille. She has won several awards during her acting career and is considered one of the richest and most influential actresses in the Philippines. Filipino actress Kristen Hermosa Kristen Hermosa: history, biography, photos Wiki facts and figures full name: Kristen Hermosa Oriel Soto stage name: Kristen Hermosa date of birth: September 9, 1983 (40 years old) place of birth: Masbate high: 1.68m Country of Citizenship: Filipino parents: Maximillian Orille, Maria Alma Hermosa-Orille Adopted Son: Christian Daniel (Kiel) children: Ondrea Bliss Sotto, Kristian Daniel Sotto, Marvic Valentin Sotto II, Kaleb Hanns Sotto brothers and sisters: Katherine Hermosa, Maxine Hermosa, Joshua Hermosa O'Rill Boyfriend • Husband: Dieter Ocampo (married 2004-2009), Oyo Boy Soto (married 2011) Profession: Actress • Television personality net worth: $7 million early life Kristine Hermosa was born on September 9, 1983, from Masbate, Philippines. Her father is Maximillian Orille and her mother is Maria Alma Hermosa-Orille. She has three siblings, Kathleen Hermosa, who preceded her in the film industry, Joshua Hermosa, and Maxine Hermosa. She is the second child of her parents. Christine Hermosa started her career at the age of 12 in 1955 when she appeared in the comedy show Ang Tv. educate Kristine Hermosa began her elementary education at the ABS-CBN Distance Learning Center in Quezon City, Philippines. She attended San Pedro College in San Pedro, Laguna, Philippines and later graduated from the Open University of the Philippines in Los Banos, Philippines. Profession Kristine Hermosa was discovered at the age of 12 when her older sister Kathleen auditioned for a television show called ABS-CBN. She played multiple roles in weekly shows in 1998, some of which were Sa Sandaling Kaliangan Mo Ako, Pangako Sa'Yo; and a soap opera with another actor, Jericho Rosales. To date, she has won several awards including the PMPC Star Awards’ Nightly TV Female Star, the New York Film Festival Awards’ Best Actress, the FHM Philippines Awards’ Hall of Fame Asia’s 100 Sexiest Actresses, and the GMMSF Box Office Entertainment Awards’ Box Office Queen. She shot to fame and became famous for starring in the hit TV series “The Promises” with another famous actor Jericho Rosales, which made the two actors a perfect match. They later starred in different TV series together including “Forever More”. Filmography Kristen Hermosa has appeared in many films over the years, including: Bagani in 2018Today in 2016Ang Daddy, the vampire of 2013Noah in 2010 social media Christine Hermosa is one of the most followed actresses in the Philippines with a large and active following on social media. She has over 2.1 million followers on Instagram. Instagram – @khsotto personal life Kristine Hermosa happened to be born into a family of four children, she is the second oldest. In 2004, she married actor Diether Ocampo, her first husband, but they divorced in 2009. However, Christine Hermosa is now living a happy life as she is married to actor Oyo Boy Soto, who is also a host. They had four children. She used her mother's maiden name, Hermosa. net worth Kristine Hermosa, a talented Filipino-born actress and television personality, has an estimated net worth of $7,000,000. [/gpt3]
data.text:
pass

Kristine Hermosa Orille-Sotto (born September 9, 1983) is one of the famous Filipino actresses and television personalities. She is known by her stage name Kristine Hermosa.

She was born in Masbate, Philippines. She has performed very well in every movie she has appeared in, gaining recognition both at home and abroad.

You are watching: Christine Hermosa Biography: First Husband, Net Worth, Age, Children, Movies, TV Shows, Adopted Son, Father, Video Blog

Her soap operas from 2000 to 2010 were hits, including Pangako Sa Yo, Sana’y Wala Nang Wales and Dahil May Isang Ikaw.

Kristen became very famous after starring in the TV series The Promises.

She is regarded as a very beautiful and talented actress whose area of ​​focus is derived from her Spanish mother, Maria Alma Hermosa-Orille.

She has won several awards during her acting career and is considered one of the richest and most influential actresses in the Philippines.

Filipino actress

Kristen Hermosa Kristen Hermosa: history, biography, photos Wiki facts and figures full name: Kristen Hermosa Oriel Soto stage name: Kristen Hermosa date of birth: September 9, 1983 (40 years old) place of birth: Masbate high: 1.68m Country of Citizenship: Filipino parents: Maximillian Orille, Maria Alma Hermosa-Orille Adopted Son: Christian Daniel (Kiel) children: Ondrea Bliss Sotto, Kristian Daniel Sotto, Marvic Valentin Sotto II, Kaleb Hanns Sotto brothers and sisters: Katherine Hermosa, Maxine Hermosa, Joshua Hermosa O’Rill Boyfriend • Husband: Dieter Ocampo (married 2004-2009), Oyo Boy Soto (married 2011) Profession: Actress • Television personality net worth: $7 million

early life

Kristine Hermosa was born on September 9, 1983, from Masbate, Philippines.

See more : Lynn Collins Biography: Husband, Age, Children, Net Worth, Movies, Height, IMDb, TV Shows

Her father is Maximillian Orille and her mother is Maria Alma Hermosa-Orille. She has three siblings, Kathleen Hermosa, who preceded her in the film industry, Joshua Hermosa, and Maxine Hermosa.

She is the second child of her parents. Christine Hermosa started her career at the age of 12 in 1955 when she appeared in the comedy show Ang Tv.

educate

Kristine Hermosa began her elementary education at the ABS-CBN Distance Learning Center in Quezon City, Philippines.

She attended San Pedro College in San Pedro, Laguna, Philippines and later graduated from the Open University of the Philippines in Los Banos, Philippines.

Profession

Kristine Hermosa was discovered at the age of 12 when her older sister Kathleen auditioned for a television show called ABS-CBN.

She played multiple roles in weekly shows in 1998, some of which were Sa Sandaling Kaliangan Mo Ako, Pangako Sa’Yo; and a soap opera with another actor, Jericho Rosales.

To date, she has won several awards including the PMPC Star Awards’ Nightly TV Female Star, the New York Film Festival Awards’ Best Actress, the FHM Philippines Awards’ Hall of Fame Asia’s 100 Sexiest Actresses, and the GMMSF Box Office Entertainment Awards’ Box Office Queen.

She shot to fame and became famous for starring in the hit TV series “The Promises” with another famous actor Jericho Rosales, which made the two actors a perfect match. They later starred in different TV series together including “Forever More”.

Filmography

Kristen Hermosa has appeared in many films over the years, including:

Bagani in 2018

Today in 2016

Ang Daddy, the vampire of 2013

Noah in 2010

social media

See more : Kaur B Biography: Age, Net Worth, Height, Songs, Spouse, Parents, Siblings, Instagram, Wiki

Christine Hermosa is one of the most followed actresses in the Philippines with a large and active following on social media.

She has over 2.1 million followers on Instagram.

Instagram – @khsotto

personal life

Kristine Hermosa happened to be born into a family of four children, she is the second oldest.

In 2004, she married actor Diether Ocampo, her first husband, but they divorced in 2009.

However, Christine Hermosa is now living a happy life as she is married to actor Oyo Boy Soto, who is also a host.

They had four children. She used her mother’s maiden name, Hermosa.

net worth

Kristine Hermosa, a talented Filipino-born actress and television personality, has an estimated net worth of $7,000,000.
